markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Mummified Cat](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1883)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Some of the wealthy have their favored pets mummified or wish to use the animal's fractured memories but strong instincts and natural weapons to turn them into formidable tomb guardians. No other animal was so trusted in the afterlife as felines, who were almost without exception buried alongside deceased pharaohs. Though small in stature, a clowder of mummified cats has ended the life of many a would-be tomb robber.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Mummified Cat](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1883)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Mummy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=228" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 130</row>

**Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +4, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +0

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +4 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 17
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

**Weaknesses**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 2

**Aura of Repose** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) 60 feet. Corpses within the aura don't decay. This aura also attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) any effect that would transform a creature in the aura into [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) (counteract level 2, counteract modifier +5).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +8 ([reach 0 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +8 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 0 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 15
- **1st**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110)

**Pounce** <actions string="Single Action" />  The mummified cat Strides and makes a Strike at the end of its movement. If the mummified cat began this action [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The mummified cat deals an additional 1d4 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-74" />
name: Mummified Cat
